snippet: LEAD: The fir-covered slopes of the High Sierra of California are teeming with blacktailed and mule deer now, and when fall replaces summer here the hunters will come to shoot them just as surely as the winter snows will follow....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The fir-covered slopes of the High Sierra of California are teeming with blacktailed and mule deer now, and when fall replaces summer here the hunters will come to shoot them just as surely as the winter snows will follow.

headline.main: Shift to Urban Living in U.S. Thins the Ranks of Hunters

byline.original: By ROBERT REINHOLD, Special to the New York Times
